divs: Sighting DetailsTwo of us were looking for our cat outside when bright orange lights started coming across the night sky in 1s, 2s, and 3s, only a few moments from eachother. One individual ran inside to grab the third person and we viewed these incredibly bright firey orange lights and counted anywhere from 30-40 of them flying accross the sky. At the end of the occurances at least a burst of 15-17 appeared in a random group and continued along the same path as the others. They were silent. We have video, pictures, and other witnesses.
Summary: 30-40 Bright Orange Lights in scattered Path going SSW from NNE
trends: There have been no other sightings in Mount Pleasant
This sighting has never been favorited.
